name: Senator Joe Manchin
Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: It's time to put politics aside and come together to do what is best for conserving the natural resources of this great nation. It's time to pass the Great American Outdoors Act.

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: This is an opportunity for to us to pass down a legacy to our kids, grand-kids, and generations to come. I believe this will be the most impactful nationwide conservation legislation since the Land and Water Conservation Fund was first created over 50 years ago.

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: The Great American Outdoors Act will help us to be good stewards of our public lands while at the same time creating thousands of new jobs ‚Äîa bipartisan win-win.

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: The impact of failing to fund maintenance in our national parks and public lands for so long is clear to see for the hundreds of millions of visitors to our public lands each year. We need to do better at taking care of these special places.

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: The Great American Outdoors Act also puts $9.5 billion towards deferred maintenance projects on federal lands. This legislation will be the most significant reduction ever in eliminating a major portion the deferred maintenance backlog on our national parks and public lands.

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: We need to secure this funding because since the Land and Water Conservation Fund was established 55 years ago, and despite the fact that every state, every territory, and almost every county has benefited from the LWCF, it has only been fully funded twice in its history.

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: The Land and Water Conservation Fund has been responsible for helping to acquire many of our nation‚Äôs most iconic and scenic lands. Just imagine what we can achieve for our country with full LWCF funding of $900 million per year, as the Great American Outdoors Act would provide.

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: Over the last week, many of my colleagues on both sides of the aisle have taken to the floor to talk about how the Great American Outdoors Act will benefit the entire country. The beauty of our nation's great outdoors brings people together and is available for everyone to enjoy.

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: @SenCapito @SenBobCasey @SenSherrodBrown @senatemajldr Fighting for the rights of coal miners is engrained in my family history and we have always understood that miners deserve better benefits, better health care and a better quality of life. #PromiseKept

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: @SenCapito @SenBobCasey @SenSherrodBrown @senatemajldr On Christmas Eve 1927, the company came and threw my family out in the cold because my grandfather was trying to improve the quality of life for all coal miners. #PromiseKept

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text:
@SenCapito @SenBobCasey @SenSherrodBrown @senatemajldr My grandfather came to this wonderful country from Italy in 1900 and started working in the coal mines at the age of 9. 
 
In 1927, he had a wife and 5 kids. He couldn‚Äôt pay his bills because he wasn‚Äôt paid in money but in company scrip. #PromiseKept https://t.co/Y4xXI3Wk0X

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text:
@SenCapito @SenBobCasey @SenSherrodBrown @senatemajldr On Dec. 11, I put a hold on all Senate legislation until I got assurances that a permanent fix would be delivered this year.

And this week, we finally secured a permanent fix in the spending deal, ensuring retired coal miners won‚Äôt lose their healthcare or pensions #PromiseKept

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: @SenCapito @SenBobCasey @SenSherrodBrown In November, I was proud to partner with a bipartisan group of my colleagues, including @senatemajldr, to introduce the Bipartisan American Miners Act that would secure pensions for 92,000 coal miners and their families and healthcare for 13,000 coal miners. #PromiseKept

name: Senator Joe Manchin
Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: @SenCapito @SenBobCasey @SenSherrodBrown I turned around and immediately introduced the American Miners Pension Act with Senator Capito and Congressman McKinley and Congressman Welch to secure pensions for 92,000 coal miners. #PromiseKept

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text:
@SenCapito @SenBobCasey @SenSherrodBrown In typical fashion, Congress waited until the very last minute. But on May 1, we secured a permanent healthcare fix for 22,600 retired coal miners. 
 
Although this was a huge win, we still needed to fulfill our whole obligation and secure miners pensions. #PromiseKept

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: @SenCapito @SenBobCasey @SenSherrodBrown In January 2017 I received assurances from then President-Elect Donald Trump that he was committed to finding a fix. But by March, 22,600 coal miners received letters telling them their healthcare would be terminated by the end of April. #PromiseKept

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: @SenCapito @SenBobCasey @SenSherrodBrown In December 2016, I threatened to shutdown the government until I was assured not one coal miner would lose their healthcare. Mitch McConnell would agree to nothing other than a four-month extension on healthcare. #PromiseKept

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: That‚Äôs why I wrote the Miners Protection Act and introduced it with my fellow Senator from West Virginia @SenCapito and Senators @SenBobCasey and @SenSherrodBrown #PromiseKept

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text:
In 2015, we knew the United Mine Workers of American 1974 Pension Plan was severely underfunded.

If the Plan became insolvent, these coal miners would have had their pensions cut and the government PBGC would have assumed billions of dollars in liabilities. #PromiseKept

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text:
Coal miners are the most patriotic people in America. 

They have done the heavy lifting. They have done everything that has been asked of them by this country. 
 
They provided the energy that made us the greatest country on earth - the superpower of the world. #PromiseKept

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: Congress can no longer allow corporations to continue this exploitation of the bankruptcy code to maximize profits and skirt their obligations to the company‚Äôs employees. I urge my colleagues to support the #SLAPAct & stand with America‚Äôs working families.

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: My bill, the Stop Looting American Pensions (SLAP) Act, will put the workers at the front of the line and protect the hard-earned pensions of American workers. https://t.co/V9JZvpEO38

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: At the end of Friendly Ice Cream's bankruptcy, most of Friendly‚Äôs assets were owned by a Sun Capital affiliate free & clear of any pension claims. Those unfunded pension obligations totaled $115M and are being assumed by the PBGC.

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: After filing bankruptcy in 2018, Sears no longer possessed enough assets to pay off its creditors, esp. its pension obligations. Now those pensions are in the hands of the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corp (PBGC), which is Sears‚Äô largest unsecured creditors, which is owed $1.5B+

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: Murray Energy has contributed 97% of the money going into the UMWA pension fund annually. With Murray‚Äôs bankruptcy filing, the UMWA pension fund will become insolvent even faster, and this crisis will snowball and impact every other multi-employer pension fund in America.

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: It is now the responsibility and duty of Congress to stop this financial engineering and close of the loopholes of our bankruptcy code. My bill, the SLAP Act, does just that.

name: Senator Joe Manchin
tweet_text: For the last few decades, numerous investment firms have manipulated sections of the bankruptcy code to maximize profits by cutting wages, reducing health benefits & slashing pensions.
